source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: The Complete Adobe After Effects CC Master Class Course
items.headline: Learn How To Create Professional Motion Graphics - From Beginner To Advanced - in Our Complete After Effects Masterclass
objectives_summary: You will learn how to animate and design new motion graphic projects from scratch
You will learn how to Import and Adjust Footage using Adobe After Effects CC
You will learn how to Build a Custom Sequence with 3D Shapes

items.title: NEW! Substance Painter All Levels Volume 1
items.headline: A comprehensive walkthrough in 3D texturing using the latest software in game production workflows.
objectives_summary: - Learn to navigate the user interface of Substance Painter
- Importing provided 3D meshes in for scene setup
- Walkthrough in how to bake maps with provided high rez meshes onto low rez models, for procedural texturing processes

items.title: Lumion: Photorealistic Arch Viz in Just 2.5 Hrs

visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger
visible_instructors.name: Adam
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop

visible_instructors.title: Learn Arch Viz
visible_instructors.name: Learn Arch
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training for the Arch Viz Community

items.headline: Lumion made easy: Learn all the essentials of Lumion while creating a professional, photorealistic rendering project.
objectives_summary: Create your first photo realistic architectural rendering with Lumion in just a few hours! No experience required!
Easily turn your SketchUp (or other models) projects into photorealistic renderings
Learn all the essential functions of Lumion from scratch in just a few hours

items.title: Maya Bootcamp - Projects Based Course
items.headline: Learn Maya from scratch by creating variety of short projects : NO previous knowledge required
objectives_summary: You will learn Maya from scratch
You will have solid knowledge in Maya FX.
You will learn Maya Bifrost.

items.title: 3D Modeling & Animation with Maya
items.headline: Have fun creating anything you want in Maya. Create your own 3d worlds! Learn creature & character design/animation!
objectives_summary: Maya, Polygonal Modeling, Texturing, Rigging, Animation, Lighting, Rendering, Character modeling, Character Rigging, Character Animation

items.title: Blender 2.8 UV Mapping
items.headline: Learn to UV Map your 3D models in Blender 2.8
objectives_summary: UV mapping in Blender 2.8
Avoiding Stretching in Your UV Islands
Hiding Seams

items.title: Female anatomy for artists
items.headline: In this course we will sculpt and draw a female body and head from scratch in Zbrush with tons of anatomy explanation.
objectives_summary: Anatomy

items.title: Spine PRO: A Complete 2D Character Animation Guide
items.headline: Learn to create professional 2D character animations for Games!
objectives_summary: Creating professional 2D animations: idle, blinking and run cycle
Advanced Spine Pro techniques for animation enhancement and 3D feel
Including: Meshes, Weights, Paths, IK, Transform Constraints, and more

items.title: Jewelery Design in ZBrush 2018 - Complete Jewelery Course
items.headline: Learn the art of Jewelery Design using  ZBrush 2018 Make your 3D Creations Real by Understanding the 3D Printing Process
objectives_summary: Have a full knowledge of creating Jewellery inside ZBrush
Understand the 3D print process as used by Shapeways

items.title: Introduction To 3D Character Animation In Unreal Engine 4!
items.headline: Bring A Character To Life In Unreal Engine 4!  Scene Files Included - Build Your 3D Animation From Start To Finish!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create a stunning cinematic animation scene in Unreal Engine 4, from beginning to end
You will learn how to create the scene in the "Preview This Course" video, step-by-step
You will receive all scene files including alien character, male & female characters, spaceship interior & music

items.title: Game Asset Creation with Houdini
items.headline: Season 2 - Procedural Buildings
objectives_summary: Students will be able to create modular, procedurally generated  game environment props quickly and with a consistent style and tone

items.title: 2D Animation Essentials in Moho & Anime Studio
items.headline: Learn the essentials and start creating your own character animations
objectives_summary: Create an Animation action scene working with keyframes
Add dynamism to your Animation working with the Camera
Draw characters using the Drawing Tools in Anime Studio

items.title: Blender 2.81 - Substance painter - Sci fi asset creation
items.headline: Discover a complete workflow for creating Sci-fi assets for video games or animation.
objectives_summary: Discover specific Blender 2.8 modeling tools and apprehend Substance painter
Create an asset ready to be imported into a game engine
Discover a workflow from A to Z for the creation of a futuristic rifle

items.title: 3ds Max: Model High-Poly Assets For Your Arch Viz Scenes

visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger
visible_instructors.name: Adam
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop

items.headline: Use 3ds Max poly modelling, Mudbox Sculpting, Custom Photoshop Textures and Vray Materials to create high poly 3d assets
objectives_summary: Model a high resolution 3d furniture piece from scratch
Master 3ds Max Poly Modelling tools
Model high-poly furniture for arch viz, and sell it online if they so desire

items.title: Learning AutoCAD Civil 3D 2016
items.headline: A Practical Course That Teaches How To Get The Most From AutoCAD Civil 3D
objectives_summary: Learn AutoCAD Civil 3D from a leading expert
Once you have completed this computer based training course, you will be fully capable of working with this CAD software and be able to apply your knowledge to your own projects.

items.title: Orc Rider and Bull Creature Creation in Zbrush
items.headline: A real time step by step course for sculpting Orc and Bull creatures for portfolio.
objectives_summary: Orc Humanoid Creature Sculpting
Monster Bull Creature Sculpting
Weapons Sculpting
